website_summaries.verdict: A top contender in robotic cleaners at a good price point.
pros: Sleek and powerful, this model is also slightly lower on the price spectrum, and users say it offers a good value for the money
It is praised for cleaning well overall, and it does best on hardwood and other hard surfaces
cons: Some issues with short battery life and occasional problems with the unit malfunctioning after months of use

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for the better versions
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do a great job. It does ok maintaining, but it is not powerful enough to actually clean. That would not be a big deal except for how easy it gets stuck on things. Don't think you are just going to program it to run at night everyday and let it go. You have to keep an eye on it so it doesn't get stuck, and try to block rooms off to get it to clean an entire room. By that point, you could have just vacuumed or swept yourself faster. The one thing it does well is get under furniture that is hard to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this model to assist with pet clean up. After bringing a Siberian Husky into our home, I discovered that I was moderately allergic to dogs. This left me sweeping on a daily basis in an attempt to cut down on fur and dander in the home. With the iLife and a good air filter, my symptoms are relieved and the mess is maintained. I would highly recommend this product to anyone suffering the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz Family

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and going strong! MUCH quieter than roomba
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these. One for my family, friends, and my mother. Got mine in 2017 and its still running great. We have 2 dogs and 2 kids and this thing performs. Plus, we can run it while watching TV or talking without it being a huge distraction. We also have a real Roomba that is quicker (moves faster around the house) and better at vacuuming (stronger brush), but cannot run it while we are home because of the extreme noise it creates. This is a great, lower cost, well made machine! Would not hesitate to buy a 4th one!
customer_reviews.author: Houstonian

customer_reviews.title: Rating is based on product life
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, but the ummf doesn't last long. We loved our "Cinderella" for the everyday pick up of dust and debris on our dark laminate flooring. Our frustration is based on the product life. When we activate Cinderella to clean she only lasts about 30 seconds before searching for the docking station to recharge. When we first ordered this product, it lasted up to two hours before returning to the docking station to recharge. I'm not the sure the price is worth 7 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great, with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: I love mine, his name is Delbert. We have 2 cats and a dog and only hardwood floors, no carpet. This little guy has been going strong for over two years now. He does not map out your house like the pricier alternatives, but you wouldn’t believe all he gets up! He does get stuck a couple of places, but it is no problem just to move him. His docking station stopped working a while ago, but we just started plugging him in. The timer never seemed to work well for us. Mopping feature works ok. Regardless of these couple of flaws, I love him! And for the price in comparison to others, he’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: this thing still found crap to run over and get stuck
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this. The mop pad is so thin and small, I'd have to change it several times to do one room; otherwise, it's just dragging dirt around. After a few hours in one room, it didn't look much cleaner. Also, after removing every possible obstacle, this thing still found crap to run over and get stuck, so I had to keep resetting it. Ugh. It took forever to prep the room. I could have mopped it much faster and done a better job with my Shark. If you have a room that is pretty bare and doesn't get much traffic, I guess this would be a good buy. Otherwise, too much hassle for too little reward.
customer_reviews.author: BorntoRead

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, this is exactly what a person with a bad back needs.  It makes a otherwise painful task a non issue.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and I am so happy with it! Super easy to set it up and charge. Perhaps a luxury to have but with a bad back this thing is great! With a normal vacuum it absolutely kills me to push & pull it back and forth, my back is screaming within 5 minutes. I used it on the carpets and it did a very good job, I can't wait to try it on my hardwood floors! Seriously, this is exactly what a person with a bad back needs. It makes a otherwise painful task a non issue.
customer_reviews.author: The Red Headed Step Child

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. It does a great job on our hardwood floors. It will reach every spot it can fit in and does a thorough job. Travels freely between our large living room and dining room doing both rooms before it goes back to it's base. It has gotten stuck a couple of times on a runner but it's not a big deal as it just shuts down until it is released. Dogs are curious but don't mind it. It has saved us a lot of time from having to sweep dog hairs constantly. For the price it's a great value as I would not pay several hundred dollars for the other more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: In general it's doing a good job for vacuuming and mopping as well
customer_reviews.text: We have got this robot few days ago. In general it's doing a good job for vacuuming and mopping as well. The biggest disappointment so far is the fact that we need to pick up everything from the floor, including regular chairs, high chairs with nickel legs and small rugs we have on our tile floor. Otherwise it's stuck and stop working. Another inconvenience is that we have 2 exits from the kitchen/dining area, both of them have thresholds of around 2 inches and the robot stuck on them as well. I'll be more than happy if this little guy will know not to climb on heights he can't make.
customer_reviews.author: Tali & Udi Bartal

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Receptacle is pretty small. I have 3 furbabies, so I have to clean it out a lot. It tends to get stuck on thresholds, which is a pain. I would never leave this going alone because of that; I have to baby gate off rooms so it doesn't get stuck. If you have a room that doesn't have a lot of obstacles, it would probably be fine. The benefit is that it does clean stuff up. The frustrating thing is that I can get it done way quicker with the vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: GeekGirlAt6600

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM ILIFE!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a one star because I can't give it ZERO stars. I am disgusted with this product and company. Save yourself the headache and buy a better Vacuum from a company with more reliable products. This particular vacuum was our second one we bought because the A4 came and it didn't last longer than 2 weeks. This one came in the mail today, used, dirty with hair all tangled in it and the mopping pad was used and disgusting! I am so mad with this company. Note, this is our SECOND vacuum from this company. STAY AWAY from ILIFE!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hexum

customer_reviews.title: Got Stucked and died at the end :(
customer_reviews.text: I tried this vaccum many times but get stucked practically everywhere!! I had to remove high chairs, chairs, shoes ecc, every time is cleaning. Usually keeps going up on high chair that I have have and I needed to pick him up and put it somewhere else. When it turns ON automatically after I'm back home I find it this way as you can see. Very disappointed and to bad I didn't returned it when I had a chance 😔 At the end it stopped working. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: ok.
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday. Started using it today. Dry vacuum is ok. this is definitely not for carpets (not even area rugs). I tried wet mopping too but not very satisfied. I was not at home when I was running wet mop. By the time I came back it was stuck at a location. The same location worked fine with dry vacuum. I moved it from the stuck location but it went and got stuck at another location with wet mop again. I bought this model primarily for wet mop function. I will try a few more times and if it acts the same way, I will have to return and get the V7 version.
customer_reviews.author: gadi

customer_reviews.title: Needs coddling
customer_reviews.text: It gets itself stuck in places and you have to rescue it so I'm not sure how it would fare being on all day while you're away. But it did pick up the pet hair and the small container fills up fast so you have to clean it out frequently. Performed much better on floors than carpet -- in fact you couldn't tell if the carpet was vacuumed even. I did not try the mop feature. I'm just going to give this to someone who will appreciate it and continue regular vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but the sensors suck!
customer_reviews.text: I give this vacuum a 3 star because it's just ok. The vacuum part is great and it sucks up a lot of pet hair and dust that I can't see. The things that drive me crazy though is how I always find it stuck somewhere. It gets stuck on area rugs, under the lip of the refrigerator, on the edge of the stove and under the chairs. It has even fallen down the steps a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: This thing is vacuuming like a beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is vacuuming like a beast. However the lid is a push open and closed and it sometimes hard to get it to stay closed. The mop function is alright I guess for cleaning up light dust, but it wont clean up dogs mud prints on the tile. I planned to return it, but since the vacuum function was so productive, I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my mother. She has dark hardwood floors and has a white husky. She says it works miracles and absolutely loves it. She works a lot and has it scheduled to vacuum while at work. She loves to come home to her floors being clean. The only downside is the vacuum does get stuck on cords and some surfaces that it tries to go under and can't get itself out, such as a cabinet and sofia. Surprisingly it does very well picking up a lot of long, white husky hair. My mom absolutely loves it. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: ILife Robotic Vacuum Needs Improving
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I liked the vacuum because it picked up cat hair well. Then I realized that I had to "babysit" it the entire time it was cleaning. It frequently got stuck under furniture, it ate an electric cord, and it did not handle flooring changes well. Shortly after our purchase, the lid latch broke and would no longer close. We tried taping it closed but that simply did not work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kasiske

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I sit working at my computer and the robot cleans. I have the control nearby in case it gets stuck on my thick shag area rugs in my bedroom, but it goes on it's own in the other rooms. I can't believe the amount of cat fur it finds and I brush my cat daily! I used the wet mop but since I don't wear outside shoes inside, it gets very little dirt on the pad; so I can't say how it would work in a "normal" household.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Excellence if you prep properly
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a piece of crap, but now I love it. It sweeps the house every night and returns to it's charging station. As long as you know how to prep things for it, it works perfectly. I recommend when you first get it, charge it and then turn it on clean. Watch and see if there are things it gets stuck on and fix as needed. Watch and see if there are certain hallways or rooms it misses. If so, move the docking station to a different room and that will change the way it travels the house. It really is an awesome little robot.
customer_reviews.author: David Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. Bad mop
customer_reviews.text: It states it mops but with only water. Who mops with just water? Then when it does mop it leaves a trail of water. She's confused half the times and hits the same spots and misses a lot of spots. I have to manually remote control her to hit the spots that she needs too. She just runs all over crazy instead of having a routine. But she does pick up well. Great vacuum. Bad mop. If I'd knew I would have settled for cheaper and not get the option with the mop.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moronta

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to walk on the floors with very minimal stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I read plenty of reviews before purchasing this as I have animals and there is hair and litter scattered around. We named her 'Rosie Jetson' and she really does pick up all of the hair, litter, dirt, etc. very well. I don't really even have to sweep my tile floors anymore as she does this for me. It is nice to walk on the floors with very minimal stuff getting on your bare feet. She does however get herself into situations where she needs assistance. She gets stuck on the rugs, under the dresser, and in other places. Overall, I would recommend. I have not tried the mopping part yet but I am sure it will do well!
customer_reviews.author: AngeeEve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for over a year now and would still give it 5 stars! I use it 3-4 times per week and it works perfectly every single time. I don’t use the mop feature, because it’s so random. As a vacuum, it’s fantastic! If you haven’t vacuumed in a while, you will have to stop it periodically to empty the canister otherwise it gets really full and just spreads debris around. I love it so much, I will definitely be buying the newest model, whenever this goes out. Even my husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: kiyabug 1

customer_reviews.title: God blessed the genius who invented this robot. Is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.text: My little robot is amazing cleans well. My area rugs no longer have hair or food crumbs from messy children after dinner no more bending down to reach under the couch with a broom or lifting heavy furniture that pain my back. My little robot does it all. I haven't try the mopping function yet. I like using an old fashion mop because I love using fabuloso. The only complaint I have is that I wish my children stop following the poor robot around and asking for the remote. No way mommy sharing her costly new toy. I have to supervise now robot and children.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: it does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It's pretty awesome that it runs around my house with just a push of a button. My babies are fascinated by it. It does a pretty good job as a vacuum cleaner. I don't really care for the mop part though. It doesn't do a good job. I'm still glad I have it because I do use the vacuum all of the time. I'll set it up in a room and block the door so it will clean around the whole room. It takes a lot of time vacuuming off of my hands. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: samone

customer_reviews.title: Time and life saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for frequent and moderate upkeep of floors. We have hardwood floors (and two dogs), and use it almost every night. We used to have to sweep every few days to get all the dog hair off, but the ILIFE allows us to only sweep once a week (but mainly because we like our place really clean). I am not sure how well this works with carpet though. The only negative comment I have is that if you are not careful, it will get stuck pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I love it! For the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it! For the price, I didn't expect such good quality, but I am so glad that I bought this little guy! -I am updating my review after about 8 months of using the product. Again - I do love this little machine. I would highly recommend the product for someone who needs a little help cleaning the floors. It amazes me what it picks up in that little collection bin every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Braud

customer_reviews.title: Sweep that dog hair away!
customer_reviews.text: I love my beetle. It works wet or dry. The directions are a little tough to read but it has so few parts you can figure it out. I put a couple drops of floor cleaner in the water for the wet cleaning and wet the rag and put some floor cleaner on that and ring it out before attaching it. It comes with 2 cloths and I bought some O Cedar Pro Mist refills and cut them to size and they work perfectly. So as the Robot vacuums the floor, the cloth dusts or mops the floor.
customer_reviews.author: DR in FL

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead of the Roomba!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this! I have two labs and three long haired cats and I run this each night before bed and it gets ALL the hair of my laminate flooring. It came with only Chinese instructions but the English manual was easily found online. It’s ahorter than the roomba and fits under all my couches tv stand and end table. We’ve named him Roberto, and he is my new best friend. Seriously get one! Way better than the roomba it’s shorter and mops y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Melissato12

customer_reviews.title: ... had this a year now and it still works pretty well. The container needs frequent emptying
customer_reviews.text: We've had this a year now and it still works pretty well. The container needs frequent emptying, and the vacuum can easily get lost or stuck, so some minimal supervision is needed, but it works great if you run it while you are doing other cleaning tasks, reading a book, cooking, or doing some other lowkey task for an hour or so. Given how much cheaper it is than the more heavily programmed bots, it seems like a reasonable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Robotic Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our kitchen/entryway area. It does a good job as a sweeper. It doesn't pick large pieces and it gets stuck on our door mats so it does require us to remove all items from the foot prior to using. I was hoping that it could take over a quick daily sweep of the floors without having to remove the rugs and other items but it does not work for us. Overall it is a good product if you have bare floors without rugs. We did try the wet cleaning feature and it does a nice wet dusting of the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie M.

customer_reviews.title: so i found a somewhat useful YouTube video of another person setting up their robot
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today on time. I was thrilled to find it perfectly packaged without any broken pieces. I got everything out ans found the user manual, which was 100% in Chinese. This is unfortunate since i don't speak or read Chinese, so i found a somewhat useful YouTube video of another person setting up their robot. It seems to work fine, but i haven't tried the water tank attachment yet. I did notice another strange item in the box. The included a European to us adapter. This is absolutely useless, if i were to take my robot on vacation obviously i would have to purchase a seperate us to European adapter
customer_reviews.author: f0

customer_reviews.title: Its been almost 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is fantastic! If you have a little one in the house with train tracks all over the place then it can get hung up on the tracks but other than that it gets a pattern going of your house and it just goes and goes until its done. When its done it will go back home to charge up. Great for when you need the floor swept and are heading out the door.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It was WAY cheaper than the Roomba, but I will say this - I have a dog and this has a small canister, so make sure you are constantly cleaning the canister that holds the dirt. I was able to do the dining room, kitchen, and breakfast nook before I had to empty the canister. It did get stuck in one rug, but it automatically turned off. Sometimes it does get a little temperamental and it doesn't listen to the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Learning more about how to use the remote controls with this item. Overall, a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness and how fast my iRobot moves around, It does pickup hair, dirt leaves my place looking clean. It mounts up on carpet, may get stuck under the bed or dresser. I suggest running it while someone is present to monitor it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyshun Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great little robot
customer_reviews.text: Great little robot... should've hired him years ago! Does a fantastic job of cleaning; just beware of it getting stuck when unsupervised. I've left it running a few times only to come back and find that it backed itself into some corner it could not find its way out of. Overall, it does a fabulous job of keeping the house clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great investment. We have two large dogs, two small children and hardwood floors. This little guy (we call it a guy and named him Ringo. My kids like to name things. ) has made a huge difference in my life as a stay at home mom. I could not keep up with the floor cleaning. The kids and dogs messed it up faster than I could clean it. This robot does a great job. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY ROBOT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY ROBOT!!! With 2 pit bulls it is an absolute time saver. I don't have to sweep every other day. I just turn on this little robot and i can relax. But Its been almost 1 year since I purchased it and I feel like one of the sensors is off and it doesn't go around the room quite like it used to, although it still gets the job done. What is the warranty on a possible replacement ?
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Filter is easy to wash. Will dry in a few hours. Ever since we got this I have put my Dyson away.. just remember to take bathroom mattes off the ground. It tries to eat it most of the times. It can get stuck under the rocking recliner. Also it may skip some areas, so I use a hand broom and move the dirt toward the middle of the walkways. We have a small dog, they stay out of each other's way. it has tried to vacuum my feet before. Doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Wowo

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for. but does the job
customer_reviews.text: it works, but you need to baby sit it. it does not turn off when stuck, does not do well on rugs, its like a restless child that keeps going where you don't want it to. does not tell you when canister is full. when it mopping mode, the fluid keeps leaking out slowly even when off. I miss the rumba. but this is cheaper. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it advertises. NOTE: This is designed for bare floors. It basically does what those skinny upright Dirt Devils, etc do. I have bare floors, and pets. I needed it for pet hair. This lil machine does the trick. One tip: if you use the floor washer function, you'll get best results if you wet/wring out the pad first. The water is dispensed slowly. This item is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Case

customer_reviews.title: and for the price the V5s is fantastic! However
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ILIFE V5s back in August and I was so excited to find an affordable robot vacuum, and for the price the V5s is fantastic! However, I was toying with the idea of buying the V7 but chose to go with the V5s because of the mopping function. If you are in the same boat I was just know that the V5 finds its home 4 times out of 10. It gets stuck constantly and it is louder that I expected, but it cleans up pet hair like a dream. Bottom line if you have the extra money to get the nicer model, do it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little robot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little robot! I have a German Sheppard mix (pictured, hiding from the robot) who looses his weight in hair every day and a boyfriend who leaves more crumbs than a two year old and this little guy cleans up wonderfully after them both! I've never owned a roomba, but this is more than perfect for us. It does well on our carpet and can get over the lips where my tile meets my hard wood. I brought "him" over to my boyfriends parents house because they're always saying our dog sheds too much when we visit and they were pleasantly surprised too! They'll be getting their own soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Coral Sea

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your carpet or flooring, this can be a great vacuum. Unfortunately, after not using mine for a few months, I just tried to fire it up and it no longer works. I got probably a year and a half of use... and I didnt use it more than once a week. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hitz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robotic vacuum, so I have nothing to compare it to, but I'd say it's a nifty little machine. It works well. It starts out a little dumb, but it seems to learn your house after a few days of vacuuming. The refuse container is small, however if you set it to vacuum daily or once every couple days, that shouldn't be a problem. I haven't yet tried out the damp mopping feature. Is it worth the money? I'd say yes.
customer_reviews.author: alphajuice14

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robot! Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical of buying this robot but after several months we are still surprised at this thing! Absolutely awesome! We call it Einstein because it's very intelligent. I can go on about how this thing gets the job done but I'll just say try this before you buy any other. Goes under sofas, mops, sweeps, and easy to operate! I hear people talking about the expensive brands and I just say... Really? This robot is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Moe

customer_reviews.title: Still happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about 10 months ago and we run it almost every day. We've had other more expensive robot vacuums and this one holds its own against them. We don't have carpet, so I can't say how it works on that, but on hardwood and concrete it vacuums and washes well. Do pick up any cords, as they can get tangled in the brushes. There are stairs and it had never fallen down them. Still happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Emcue

customer_reviews.title: So far satisfied. Wish it had larger box to hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the Ilife v5s for few days only. So far satisfied. Wish it had larger box to hold the debris . Also some times it needs help with the navigation to cover my full house one level. Does not seem to be very effective on the carpet. I have wooden floors and vinyl covering most of my house, so this works ok for me. Given the price point and the functionality , its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how many times I have recommended this product since we purchased a year ago. Excellent, cleans well, senses debris on the floor. You just have to empty the bin from time to time and "free" it if it gets caught on something on the floor (incentive to pick up your dirty clothes!)
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Poulos @ Sunday Southern

customer_reviews.title: If Harry Potter were to clean your floors
customer_reviews.text: Ok works great except for these issues; shoe laces, cords of any kind and lightweight throw rugs. If it encounters any of the above it becomes tangle-not. Hard floors are magically cleaned as if it were Harry Potter own spell. Thin carpet no problem plush carpet may take a while but in the end it gets the job done. But cords of any king puts the stupify hex on it.
customer_reviews.author: mr. Clean

customer_reviews.title: does a great job on hardwood and tile but not so great ...
customer_reviews.text: does a great job on hardwood and tile but not so great on carpet. Have not tried the water tank yet but with a dog in the house and mostly hardwood floors, it is a great way to maintain the dog hair and worth every penny. It is scheduled to kick off while we are at work and done by the time we get home. One thing to keep in mind is that it gets stuck easily. You need to run it several times while home prior to scheduling it while away. We needed to put thing under certain tables or chairs to prevent it from getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Y'all I recommend this vacuum! If you have any pets, or a toddler like a do it's a LIFE SAVER!! It picks up so much fur! I was vacuuming 3-4 times a day between 3 cats (I'm fostering kittens), a dog and my messy 2 year old and now I only have to vacuum maybe 1 time a day! It literally picks up so much! I will be recommending it to everyone I know. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey & Michael

customer_reviews.title: They are the best you can get for the money
customer_reviews.text: I own four of these, yes, FOUR. They are the best you can get for the money. The ONLY drawback is it might not find the base station 100% of the time. I mean 1/9th the price of a roomba? Yea, ill take my chances of it not finding the base station
customer_reviews.author: rhcp011235

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've had since March. It still works great with no issues. Stay away from the Bobsweep brand. I purchased it at the same time and it is no longer working.
customer_reviews.author: C,L, Richey

customer_reviews.title: Get vacuum for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love her and so do my kids! I named her Rosie after the jetsons. I have two kids under 3 and a husband and a dog and she keeps my floors super clean. She scoops up all the crumbs the kids trailed behind them and all the dog hair! Love her and I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A5hI3y

customer_reviews.title: This has worked perfect in my home
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfect in my home, we have 5 boys and two dogs that shed, it keeps our wood floors clean! It finds it way around just fine and never gets stuck for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 5 months of first usage. Company sent out a replacement to use when my was supposed to be repaired, and failed to send a return slip. Had to ask a second time, and they still failed to send a return slip. Poor product, poor customer service. Would recommend spending a bit more money for a better product from a more reputable company with better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: He thinks I love this thing more than him
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how disgustingly obsessed I am with this thing. I have convinced 3 co-workers to buy this and now they're obsessed too. My husband has even told me he's jealous of my robot. He thinks I love this thing more than him. My robot helps clean up his mess, so he wouldn't be 100% incorrect
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: ... Beymax) for a few days but so far its pretty great! I noticed that he just died rather ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this guy (that we have affectionately named Beymax) for a few days but so far its pretty great! I noticed that he just died rather than docking himself on his charger and he seems to get high centered on our transition strips but he picks up pet hair very well! I have not tried the mop feature yet but will post an updated review when I do!
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received this for a Mother's Day gift and it's fabulous! So easy to use, easy to empty, easy to switch tanks and have it wash the floor. I had no idea there was so much dirt, dust, pet hair, etc. I love the feeling of a freshly washed floor on bare feet. Will not be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Tut's woman

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item in January and love it. I use it one to two times ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in January and love it. I use it one to two times a week with my wood and carpet floors. I haven't used the mopping option yet. It's so easy to use, I just have to pick up a couple of rugs and it takes care of the whole house. I have 1500 sq ft and rarely use my regular vacuum. You do have to empty the dirt out two or three times for the two hours or so it runs. It took my dog a little while to get used to it, she barked at it quite a bit when we first got it. Life Saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! We recently got a Dalmatian and we have black floors so there is white hair everywhere all the time! I set this guy up to vacuum every night and get to wake up to a clean house every morning. The mop works awesome as well though I recommend wetting the mop pad first.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only a few mos - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for awhile. Now it just goes backwards and then stops. I tried everything to try to get it to work again. I have no clue where to even go to get pointed to the right direction on getting this thing fixed.
customer_reviews.author: R. SARROCK

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. The only complaint is that there is no indicator to let you know it's full and it keeps getting caught up on rugs, chords, and other spaces with obstacles. Sucks a lot of crud up but doesn't navigate evenly throughout home. It never goes where I needed it to. :/
customer_reviews.author: Dalya84

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought it to help with the dog hair between cleanings and it works wonderfully. The only downside is it struggles with my 2 small area rugs so I end up lifting them up shaking them out and putting them somewhere til it's done. Haven't used the mopping function yet though.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. It’s my second robot-type vacuum and it works great. It cleans best on hard wood floors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: It would be great in a large room with little furniture
customer_reviews.text: It would be great in a large room with little furniture. It had good suction and worked good only I had to babysit it to keep it from getting stuck, so for me it was not useful I could do my floors in much less time than baby sitting. I was looking for a way to maximize my time. I knew it would probably get stuck on area rugs and I only have one in the livingroom, but it had no trouble there it was the furniture, cabinets, and small areas that gave the most trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this silly thing, it does a great job and I don't have to run a vacuum around as often. It goes from tile to up on the area rugs with no problem...plus it entertains the dogs, bonus. I'm thinking of getting another one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: This was a bust
customer_reviews.text: Item failed within the first few days, staff was rude about replacing it. The replacement only lasted a month or two. It just quit working. It's a good idea, it just didn't last at all. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: This is a working Mom's DREAM
customer_reviews.text: Instructions weren't in English, but seller sent new ones via email same day of request, very pleased with their service and the vacuum/mop saves this busy working mom HOURS of time - which is invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: but would like it better if it had brushes to pick up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but would like it better if it had brushes to pick up hair better. The small size of the dust cup makes it necessary to empty frequently. The "mopping" function is iffy. You *really* need to dampen the cloth before putting it on the machine. I do like the "drivability" of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jo M.

customer_reviews.title: Kevin is my best friend. He cleans my apt when I'm out
customer_reviews.text: I named my robot Kevin. Kevin is my best friend. He cleans my apt when I'm out. I live in a large studio. He never succeeds to find his way home but I'm happy to put him back on his dock after I come back from work. Kevin is great for my current situation especially at the price point. He is fantastic I love him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not reallt smart. work good with the vaccum but mopping is ...
customer_reviews.text: not reallt smart. work good with the vaccum but mopping is suck. if your house has floor and carpet you better use the remote control for it stay away from carpet because it doesn't recognize carpet WHEN MOPPING
customer_reviews.author: chauhvu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. It does well with floor dirt pick up and wet cleaning. The only beef I have with it is that it doesn't have the gps so it doesn't know where it's been. At times it will go in the same place over and over again and will miss other spots on the floor. I find I have to let it run for a couple of hours to get a good chuck of the floor clean. But def saves me time from having to constantly sweep my floor and mop. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Speer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Roomba!
customer_reviews.text: After owning 2 iRobot roomba I can say this is AMAZING. What a deal! Under $200 and a great improvement. So quiet! Smaller so gets around better. Has more features than the Roomba 650. I haven't tried the wet mop feature but will try it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Kugle

customer_reviews.title: I love my ILife
customer_reviews.text: I love my ILife! I also have a Roomba, which is older and cost more, but they both have been awesome. My Roomba is louder than my ILife, but the Roomba is probably 5 years older. They both are great, and the ILife is quieter! I feel like the bin on the ILife is bigger also!
customer_reviews.author: allisonjett

customer_reviews.title: Forget a roomba, get this!
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs, two large and one mini. We would have to sweep and vacuum 3 to 4 times a day to keep it clean. With this, my wife doesn't pick up the broom. The moping feature is useless I think. Similar to just kinda softly wiping a damp rag on your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does an amazing job though
customer_reviews.text: only drawback is that it doesnt "learn" and kind of just wanders around the house. It does an amazing job though, and for the price, you cant beat it. It has made having a 6 month old german sheperd effortless. We have hardwood floors and we run it every day. Great product. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: m mc

customer_reviews.title: I love this ILIFE robotic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this ILIFE robotic vacuum. I have a small apartment with hardwood floors and carpet in the bedroom. It does a great job at picking up everything from pet hair/dust particles to larger pieces of debris. I run this vacuum a couple times a week and notice a huge difference than just sweeping or vacuuming alone. It does sometime get stuck on small rugs or under my sofa but otherwise it is excellent at climbing on top of difference surface areas. I would highly recommend this product. It does an great job moping as well, very easy to clean and transition to sweep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat robo vac
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat robo vac! Can't beat the price. It sometimes gets lost trying to go back to it's base when it needs to charge and has only a few settings on it (wish I could schedule it to clean daily instead of once!) but other than that, pretty good. Very impressed with how much it picks up. Also, very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it is a great help keeping the ...
customer_reviews.text: This does everything as promised. Only problem I have is that it gets stuck under some of my furniture, such as our recliner or even under a cabinet every once in a while. So with that I just run it when I am home cooking or picking up or doing anything else. That way I can get it unstuck so it can continue cleaning for me! I love it and it is a great help keeping the day to day crumbs and pet hair cleaned up. It is quiet enough to watch some TV while it cleans too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We can hardly wait to get three other rooms carpet out so ilife can clean them off as it doesn't work so great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I Life has given me my life back! Not that I swept everyday but with two shedding dogs we sure needed to. Now we run ilife everyday sometimes twice a day and it never fails to pick up what you don't even realize is there. This also cuts down on the dust on the furniture. We can hardly wait to get three other rooms carpet out so ilife can clean them off as it doesn't work so great on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Shell out another $100 bucks and buy better
customer_reviews.text: In short, you get what you pay for ... an aimless vacuum cleaner on wheels. I have owned a Roomba before and have to say that this is no competition at all. It gets stuck in the oddest of situations - room dividers are its worst enemy, banister etc. Lack of virtual walls is a big constraint which I did not realize before I bought this. It has almost never found its way back on its own to its charging station, so I'm not even sure it has any intelligence in tracking what it has cleaned or hasn't. Reminds me of the screen scrapers with the ball just bouncing around from wall to wall. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nirav Mehta

customer_reviews.title: My floors stay clean now 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner about a week ago and I absolutely LOVE IT!!! My floors stay super clean now.. One thing to remind people is to watch cords bc it will pick them up and try to pull them ( that just shows how powerful the suction is on this sucker lol) I would definitely recommend this to my family & friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it.! Sometimes it gets lost and can't find its way back home when it's on the opposite side of my house. And it's a little on the loud side but it works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rudeboy7000

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but kept getting stuck
customer_reviews.text: It did a decent job the battery life went great for a long time but after a year it wouldn’t hold charge for very long and it usually went to the same places in the floor unless I would try to redirect it over and over. Also it always got stuck somewhere and it especially loved my rocketing chair!! It would go and try to ride the metal legs under the chair and get stuck every s I n g l e time so I eventually just put it up and never used it again
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It gets stuck on everything
customer_reviews.text: It gets stuck on everything. You have to watch it the entire time it is working and it ends up being a total waste of time. It was a nice novelty first, but it has been sitting in the corner completely unused for over a month now. I've gone back to using the regular old vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I call it my new best friend. It is sort of annoying to watch because it just goes with no pattern but if you let it do it's thing it gets it all cleaned up. I have all hard wood and it fits under my couches getting dust and dirt that I don't effectively get weekly as I don't enjoy moving my furniture. I haven't "mopped" with it yet because it is so clean. Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Stapleton’s

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Just ran over things or flung them across the floor with the spinny brush.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Hooligans

customer_reviews.title: We have a yellow lab and a boxer in our ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a yellow lab and a boxer in our house and have been wearing their hair for a couple of years. Lilly, the name of our iLIFE V5s, has been keeping our house manageable for the last month. I was worried that she might not be able to vacuum the rugs and the hardwoods that run through my house, but they are no problem. I also a staircase that I wondered how she would clean without falling down the steps. She cleans that area and has not taken a tumble. I am not sure how we made it without her.
customer_reviews.author: Graber Acres

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. It works great so far. It does get hung up but I just watch what it gets high up on and try and fix it. It is pretty quiet but it does make a noise. So far very happy with the purchass
customer_reviews.author: Dore S

customer_reviews.title: Not good for carpeted areas
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool and has multi function including mopping and works well in hard surface. However, the the vacuum power is not so good in the carpeted areas, barely works even with max settings.
customer_reviews.author: 871lennon

customer_reviews.title: Superb for Hardwood Floors or Tile!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty skeptical about buying a robot vacuum but this little thing is absolutely amazing. We have a dog and two cats in the house, all of which shed like crazy. If you have pets, this is the vacuum for you! We liked it so well that we bought another one for use upstairs. I can't say enough good things about this vacuum. I would highly recommend it to anyone. We do, however, have hardwood floors throughout our house so I cannot speak to how well it works on carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well for the price. I have a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for the price. I have a really big house so it doesn't cover the whole area before it has to go back home and recharge. But if it vacuums every day, floors stay clean because what it didn't get yesterday, it gets today. Mopping part doesn't release enough water in my opinion, so I just dampen the pad first and let it add more water as it goes.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer  p. roberts

customer_reviews.title: Preset Timer Stops Working
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. Gets stuck on furniture legs a lot. Then after about 9 months the preset start time stopped working. Tried resetting it many times and reading online but nothing worked. And this was something I read in a review before I purchased two of them! Should have listened. And I Should try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our I-Life vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We love our I-Life vacuum. We have all wood floors throughout our house, and this little guy does a great job picking up dust and dirt in between our heavier cleanings. We don't have dogs, but we have a cat. We clean out the tank and filter between each use. We recommend this vacuum to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever! I never use the mopping option. But I works great! Other friends even bought it after they saw mine. Runs for about 1&1/2 to 2 hrs and finds its own way back to charging base.if you’re thinking about buying a roomba, don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for cats hair
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i put 3 stars,because it doesn't clean cats hair on rug. Not as good clean. I read reviews and description,it was supposed to do better with cats hair. On other types of flooring it cleans good. I haven't tried to mop yet.
customer_reviews.author: Free bird

customer_reviews.title: My new cleaning buddy!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome! It was very easy to set up and does a great job on my carpets, tile and hardwoods. The water tank is big enough to clean my bathrooms but needs to be refilled for my kitchen. It does a great job and seems to pick up all the sticky spots on my kitchen floor. I have a low cut pile carpet throughout the house and a large shedding dog - does fantastic! I had concerns with it falling down our stairway but that isn't an issue. Buy this little friend! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vacuum for bare floors and tiles
customer_reviews.text: Great robot vacuum for bare floors and tiles . Much cheaper than comparable name brands. I run mine every morning and my floorshave never been cleaner. Love the mopping option though make to not to get any parts of tyke robot wet. Excellent customer service! Gave me a free replacement for one that had water seep into the sensors.
customer_reviews.author: JONOWEN008

product_meta.title: ILIFE V5s, Robotic Vacuum Cleaner and Mopping, Slim, Automatic Self-Charging, Daily Schedule, Ideal for Pet Hair, Hard Floor and Low Pile Carpet, Old Version.
feature_bullets: Vacuuming Mopping Sweeping all in one, for entirely thoroughly cleaning
New powerful motor with max mode and pet hair technology picks up furs,debris,dust and dirty easily and efficiently
Small slim light design and smart sensors ensure ILIFE V5s Pro goes easily under the sofas,beds,kickstands,around the furniture,crossing the chair legs
Less working noise for a quite comfortable home. smart sensors anti-bump and anti-fall.
Automatically docks, recharges and adjusts to hard floor types - tile, hardwood, laminate & more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,076 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 1-year manufacturer's limited warranty on robot, 6-month manufacturer's limited warranty on battery.
